name: Ruined Ruins
description:
Rebuild the ruins by rebuilding the words!.  With 20 levels to challenge you!.

Each level consists of a ruin which needs to be rebuilt by replacing the fallen and buried letter stones. Some of the stones in the ruins are still standing which provide clues to the puzzle.  It sounds simple, but the trick is that words must make sense both vertically and horizontally! 

I developed it with mobile in mind. I gave it a bright and fun theme which is typical in casual mobile games.

This is my entry for the GDevelop game jam. This was my first time using the GDevelop engine and I thoroughly enjoyed learning it. I was actually surprised how easy it is to prototype a game in the engine and end up with something with a bit of quality to it. I'll definitely be using it again in the future!.
